external_games.name: Rurouni Kenshin: Meiji Kenkaku Roman-tan - Juuyuushi Inbou-hen
Rurouni Kenshin: Meiji Kenyaku Romantan: Juuyuushi Inbou Hen

name: Rurouni Kenshin: Meiji Kenkaku Roman-tan - Juuyuushi Inbou-hen
summary: Rurouni Kenshin: Meiji Kenkaku Roman-tan: Juuyuushi Inbou-hen is a role-playing based on the Rurouni Kenshin series which featured 2D fighting game inspired battles. It was released by Sony on the PlayStation system in Japan
